title: Document Patient Education
description: A nurse has just educated a newly diagnosed diabetic patient on how to use a glucose meter. This education must be documented.

tasks.description: Open the patient's chart and find the patient education flowsheet.
tasks.expected_outcome: Nurse navigates to the correct documentation area.
Nurse chooses the appropriate education category.

tasks.description: Document that education on 'Glucose Meter Use' was provided and that the patient demonstrated understanding.
tasks.expected_outcome: Nurse successfully documents the education session, meeting regulatory requirements.
